unittitle_ssm: New York & Brooklyn Bridge and Brooklyn City viewbook
abstract_ssm: The album contains 35 black-and-white illustrations of Brooklyn scenes, located in Downtown Brooklyn, the Brooklyn Navy Yard (formally known as the New York Naval Shipyard), Brooklyn Heights, Williamsburg, and Prospect Park.
